patthana12.16:1.1: Nasaraṇaṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana12.16:2.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nanoāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha ekaṃ. Vipākaṃ natthi.)
patthana12.16:3.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha ekaṃ.)
patthana12.16:4.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naanāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana12.16:5.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naāsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana12.16:6.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naāsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha ekaṃ. Vipākaṃ natthi.)
patthana12.16:7.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naāsavañceva naanāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana12.16:8.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha ekaṃ. Vipākaṃ natthi.)
patthana12.16:9.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṃ naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha ekaṃ. Vipākaṃ natthi.)
patthana12.16:10.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naāsavavippayuttaṃ nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha ekaṃ.)
patthana12.16:11.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naāsavavippayuttaṃ naanāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
